Class JwtUtils

java.lang.Object
com.example.ioproject.auth.security.jwt.JwtUtils
@Component public class JwtUtils extends Object
Utility class for handling JSON Web Tokens (JWT) operations such as generating, parsing, and validating JWT tokens.

    validateJwtToken(String authToken)

  • Method Details

    • generateJwtToken

      public String generateJwtToken(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
      Generates a JWT token for the authenticated user.
      Parameters:
      authentication - the authentication object containing user details
      Returns:
      the generated JWT token as a String

    • getUserNameFromJwtToken

      public String getUserNameFromJwtToken(String token)
      Extracts the username (subject) from the JWT token.
      Parameters:
      token - the JWT token
      Returns:
      the username extracted from the token

    • validateJwtToken

      public boolean validateJwtToken(String authToken)
      Validates the JWT token by parsing it and checking its signature, expiration date, and format.
      Parameters:
      authToken - the JWT token to validate
      Returns:
      true if the token is valid, false otherwise
